document_data.name: analyze item
document_data.mainbody: '''''Analyze item''''' was an [[utterance]] from the Lexicon of the Crafted Tool that used [[truespeak]] to reveal all magic that [[enchanted]] or affected an item.
document_data.Usage: The utterance revealed all the spells that affected an item, if any, and if it was magical, it also revealed its charges, the way to activate it, and what its powers were. The utterance did nothing with [[artifact]]s.
